etomica.integrator

Class IntegratorPT.BoxTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.integrator.IntegratorPT.BoxTracker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataSource, IEtomicaDataSource, IListener, java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    IntegratorPT

    public static class IntegratorPT.BoxTracker
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEtomicaDataSource, IListener, java.io.Serializable
    Meter that tracks the swapping of the boxes in parallel-tempering simulation. Designed for input to a DisplayPlot to provide a graphical record of how the boxes swap configurations.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
